topic: transition semester to the master's degree
question: Hello, I wanted to ask if I can still be enrolled after completing my bachelor's degree while waiting for the grades to serve as a transition semester to the Master's in Games Engineering. I plan to apply for the Master's only in the summer. Is that possible?"
answer: Hello, if you have just received the final grades for your Bachelor's degree, you can still remain in your Bachelor's degree program for the entire winter semester.
